  1. County Spotlight
    See what’s new in Clay County

  1. Flood Information

    Announcements, Road Closures, and General Information about Flooding. Read on...

  2. The Clay County Courthouse is a Secure Building

    The general public will enter the Courthouse through the Main (East) entrance. The North and South entrances are locked. A security check point is permanently established at the Main entrance. Read on...

  3. Recycling

    Clay County is proud to support recycling opportunities throughout the county. There are centers in each city for general recyclables. Read On

  4. FM Area Diversion Project

    Learn more about regional flood protection in the Fargo-Moorhead area. Read On

  5. Property Information Search

    Search by Parcel ID or Address to find the property information. Read On

  6. Plats, Corners & Surveys

    Learn about plats, corners and surveys, and view them online. Read On

News Flash

  1. New online Road Closure Map is now available.

    New online Road Closure Map is now available. Map will display road statuses in real-time due to floods, construction or any other event. Read on...

  2. Spring Load Restrictions Starting Date

    The STARTING DATE for Spring Load Restrictions in Clay County for the CENTRAL and NORTH-CENTRAL ZONES will be Tuesday, March 19, 2019 at 12:01 AM. Read on...

  3. Attention Contractors - Public Notice

    Clay County has designated its official website as claycountymn.gov. Official publication of bids, requests for information, and requests for proposals will be done on the official website as an additional means to Read on...

  4. Website Personalization Now Available!

    With the launch of the new MyDashboard feature, visitors to our website can now customize their viewing experience! Read on...
